requirement_tested: Implement a website with an anonymous reporting feature allowing users to submit insights and evidence
user_persona: A concerned citizen who has uncovered corporate misconduct and wishes to report it anonymously.
user_goal: To successfully submit a confidential report along with supporting documents without revealing their identity.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing the Reporting Form
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to the whistleblower website and finds the 'Submit Anonymous Report' option prominently displayed on the homepage.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Submit Anonymous Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A form titled 'Submit Anonymous Report' appears with fields for title, content, and a file upload zone, styled with midnight blue elements on an azure background.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out the Report
narrative_steps.description: Alex fills in the report title and describes the misconduct in detail. They also prepare several documents as evidence.
narrative_steps.action: Enter text into the title and content fields. Drag and drop files into the upload zone.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The file upload zone highlights during drag-over and shows a preview of the attached files before submission.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Report
narrative_steps.description: Confident that all information is accurate and complete, Alex clicks the Submit button to send the report securely.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system sends the data to the reportSubmissionAPI and displays a confirmation message indicating successful submission.

requirement_tested: Include a discussion forum for users to share thoughts and opinions
user_persona: A community member interested in discussing recent reports and exchanging ideas with others.
user_goal: To participate in ongoing discussions by reading threads and posting thoughtful replies.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Forum Threads
narrative_steps.description: Taylor visits the forum section from the main navigation and sees a list of active discussion threads.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the forum section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of forum threads is displayed with titles, authors, timestamps, and reply counts, using midnight blue cards on an azure background.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Thread Details
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by a thread about environmental violations, Taylor clicks on it to read more and view existing replies.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific thread.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The full thread content and conversation history load dynamically without refreshing the page.

narrative_steps.title: Contributing to the Discussion
narrative_steps.description: After reading, Taylor decides to contribute by typing a well-thought-out reply and submitting it.
narrative_steps.action: Type a reply in the text box and click 'Post Reply'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The reply is submitted via the threadReplyAPI and immediately appended to the current thread view.

requirement_tested: Add a search functionality enabling users to search by topics and keywords
user_persona: A researcher looking for specific information across various sections of the website.
user_goal: To find relevant content quickly using targeted keywords and filtering options.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating a Search
narrative_steps.description: Jordan recalls reading about financial fraud and wants to revisit those articles. They use the search bar at the top.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'financial fraud' into the search bar and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search results appear categorized by type (reports, forums, blogs) with filtering options available.

narrative_steps.title: Refining Search Results
narrative_steps.description: Too many results appear, so Jordan selects the 'Blog Posts' filter and sorts them by most recent.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Blog Posts' filter and select 'Sort by Newest'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The searchAPI re-fetches results filtered to blog posts and sorted by newest first, updating the display instantly.

requirement_tested: Create a news and blog section for publishing latest articles and updates
user_persona: An advocate staying informed on current events related to transparency and accountability.
user_goal: To read the latest published articles and stay updated on important developments.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Published Articles
narrative_steps.description: Casey goes to the News & Blog section to catch up on recent publications and notices a featured article.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the News & Blog section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid layout showcases featured articles with thumbnails, headlines, excerpts, and publication dates, styled consistently with the site's theme.

narrative_steps.title: Reading a Full Article
narrative_steps.description: Interested in the featured article, Casey clicks on it to read the full piece, which includes richly formatted content.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an article tile.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dedicated article page loads and renders markdown-formatted content accurately.

requirement_tested: Design the website with an azure background and midnight blue UI components
user_persona: A new visitor exploring the site for the first time.
user_goal: To experience a visually cohesive and accessible interface that aligns with the stated color scheme.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Design
narrative_steps.description: Riley lands on the homepage and takes note of the overall aesthetic and branding consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Browse the homepage visually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All pages feature an azure (#F0FFFF) background with midnight blue (#191970) used for navigation bars, buttons, forms, and container accents.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With UI Components
narrative_steps.description: Riley interacts with different parts of the UI—buttons, links, and forms—to confirm visual consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over and click various interactive elements like buttons and links.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive components maintain the midnight blue color scheme and provide clear visual feedback upon interaction.

requirement_tested: Develop a frontend that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A developer verifying that the frontend properly integrates with backend services.
user_goal: To ensure all dynamic content on the site is sourced from backend API calls instead of hardcoded data.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: Dev opens the network tab and navigates to the homepage to inspect how data is loaded.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser DevTools and navigate to the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Network requests are made to backend endpoints like /api/reports, /api/blog-posts, etc., retrieving actual data rather than static placeholders.

requirement_tested: Build a backend that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A systems administrator deploying the application in a production environment.
user_goal: To verify that the backend service successfully establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: SysAdmin starts the backend server and monitors logs for database connectivity messages.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Logs indicate successful initialization of the database connection using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with npm run install:all to install both frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A new team member setting up the project locally for the first time.
user_goal: To set up the entire development environment efficiently with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Newbie clones the repository and runs the setup command to get everything ready.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Set up package.json with npm run dev to start both frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer beginning daily work on the application.
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend development servers simultaneously for efficient workflow.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Dev begins work by starting both development environments together.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend development servers start concurrently, with unified terminal output showing logs from each.

requirement_tested: Ensure all submitted reports are stored securely in the database
user_persona: A compliance officer auditing the system's handling of sensitive data.
user_goal: To confirm that all submitted whistleblower reports are securely stored in the database with proper safeguards.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Storage
narrative_steps.description: Auditor checks the database after a test report submission to ensure secure storage practices.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect the 'reports' table in the PostgreSQL database.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Submitted reports are stored with fields including id, title, content, submitted_at, status, and attachment_urls, potentially with encryption for sensitive fields.

requirement_tested: Enable user authentication system to support anonymous submissions while maintaining security
user_persona: A potential whistleblower preparing to make their first report.
user_goal: To initiate a report submission securely without having to register or provide identifying information.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Anonymous Session
narrative_steps.description: Whistleblower begins the reporting process and gets automatically assigned a temporary anonymous session.
narrative_steps.action: Start filling out the anonymous report form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system issues a short-lived JWT token allowing anonymous access without collecting personal identifiers.

requirement_tested: Implement moderation tools for managing forum discussions and reported content
user_persona: A site moderator tasked with reviewing user-generated content.
user_goal: To manage and moderate forum threads and submitted reports effectively using built-in tools.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Moderation Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Moderator logs into the admin panel and accesses the moderation tools section.
narrative_steps.action: Log in as a moderator and navigate to the moderation dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dashboard is shown with queues of pending reports, flagged forum posts, and quick-action controls, styled with the site’s theme.

narrative_steps.title: Taking Moderation Action
narrative_steps.description: Moderator identifies an inappropriate forum post and decides to remove it.
narrative_steps.action: Click the delete button next to the flagged post.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The post is removed via the moderationToolsAPI and disappears from public view immediately.

requirement_tested: Provide filtering and sorting options within the search functionality
user_persona: A frequent user seeking precise search results tailored to their interests.
user_goal: To refine searches using filters and sort results according to preference.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: User searches for 'corporate ethics' and then applies filters to narrow down the results.
narrative_steps.action: Enter search term, then toggle filter checkboxes for 'Reports' and 'Published Last Month'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Filter selections update the live-preview count and apply to subsequent searches, returning only matching results.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting Results
narrative_steps.description: User prefers to see the most popular discussions first.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Popularity' sort icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results are re-fetched and reordered based on popularity metric, updating the list dynamically.

requirement_tested: Support rich text editing or markdown for blog and news article creation
user_persona: An editorial staff member drafting a new blog post for publication.
user_goal: To compose and format a compelling article using a familiar editing interface.

narrative_steps.title: Writing and Formatting Content
narrative_steps.description: Writer opens the blog creation tool and begins writing, applying formatting styles as they go.
narrative_steps.action: Open the rich text editor and begin typing content, using toolbar buttons to add headings and bold text.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: As content is typed and formatted, the adjacent live-preview pane updates in real time to reflect the changes.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Media
narrative_steps.description: Writer wishes to insert an infographic to accompany the article.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Insert Image' button and choose a file to upload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A file dialog prompts for selection, and once chosen, the image is embedded with appropriate markup in the editor.

requirement_tested: Include admin panel for managing news, blog posts, and monitoring reports
user_persona: An administrator overseeing the site's content and operations.
user_goal: To manage site content and monitor activity through a centralized administrative interface.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Admin Panel
narrative_steps.description: Admin accesses the protected admin area to perform routine maintenance tasks.
narrative_steps.action: Visit /admin and enter admin credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Upon successful authentication, the admin dashboard loads with navigation sidebar linking to various management modules.

narrative_steps.title: Managing Content
narrative_steps.description: Admin reviews pending reports and decides to publish one that looks credible.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the reports management section and click 'Publish' on a selected report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The action triggers a call to the respective management API and the report status is updated instantly in the dashboard.
